description: Defines mock classes for package management interfaces used in testing, including PackageManagerMock and PackageInstallerMock, with mocked methods for package handling operations.

classes.name: PackageManagerMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing IPackageHandler for package management, with mocked methods for locking, unlocking, and retrieving information about packages.

classes.name: PackageInstallerMock
classes.description: Mock class implementing IPackageInstaller for package installation processes, providing mocked methods for registering, installing, uninstalling, and listing packages.

methods.name: Lock
methods.description: Mocks the locking of a package with specific packageId, version, and lock reason.

methods.name: Unlock
methods.description: Mocks unlocking a package identified by packageId and version.

methods.name: GetLockedInfo
methods.description: Mocks retrieval of information about a locked package.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Mocks registration of a package installer notification sink.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Mocks unregistration of a package installer notification sink.

methods.name: Install
methods.description: Mocks installing a package with specified parameters.

methods.name: Config
methods.description: Mocks retrieving and setting configuration for a package.

methods.name: PackageState
methods.description: Mocks retrieving the state of a package.

methods.name: GetConfigForPackage
methods.description: Mocks fetching configuration details for a package from a file locator.
